attributes.action: Nicola Sturgeon and the SNPs lack of support for oil and gas workers
attributes.background:
During the independence referendum the Nationalists repeatedly said that oil would form the economic base for an independent Scotland.
We need concrete action from the Scottish Government to help people find work. It is time that the SNP took their head out of the sand.

rejection.details:
Your petition is asking the Scottish Government, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
